parameters: I-I can't believe I went out of my way to bake the Captain a pie...\!
What's wrong with me.\! Rota would surely laugh if she saw this.\!
I hope she likes it...\! Ugh, the anticipation is killing me.\!

Shit!\! This is the 4th cake I've burnt!\! Why is something this

fat!\! We need to ration these remember?!\!

Rozzy~\! It's been a while!\! Hope you met our adorable daughter~

Lady Serana has me on cooking duty...
There are sooooo many carrots here...\! I don't know if I can absorb any more...
I'm supposed to clean but everytime I try to, I just leave goop everywhere...
This place?\! What was it?\! Did it have something to do with that Captain of yours I've heard so
T-the captain?\! W-what do you know about her?
This was how the place we lived in and operated from looked like.
You mean you were married to your Captain and lived as a wife here?
N-n-nonesense!\! It was just a military base.
Military base?\! Were you part of a war?\! Does it have to do with the missing years
Huh, so this floor is entirely run by slimes.\! You weren’t kidding.
Yeah. It's a pretty interesting place.\! Apparently they came from another dimension, which begs
the question of how you and your sister were able to drag them into this place...
I-I wouldn’t know to be totally honest...\! Maybe it was just some sort of accident
when we moved from our home to here?
Rozzy!\! You’re here again to visit?\! Who's this girl you’ve brought with you?
Oh!\! Serana, hey!\! This is Thalia, I met her a few floors up.\! We’re helping a friend in the search
This slime girl...\! *Sniff sniff* Why does she have some of your smell?
I want your fat salami too!
Calm down, Thalia, we are trying to help Hildr, remember?
In any case, I found a few books. I have no idea what they are about, but maybe
they might be useful to you?
Oh!\! Yeah we’ll check those out, then!\! Thanks, Serana!
Huh, so this floor is entirely run by slimes.\! You weren’t kidding.
Yeah. It's a pretty interesting place.\! Apparently they came from another dimension, which begs the question of
how you and your sister were able to drag them into this place...
I-I wouldn’t know to be totally honest...\! Maybe it was just some sort of accident
when we moved from our home to here?
H-hey, Serana.\! We’re just swinging by to look for some information for a friend.
Ok, sure. I found a few books. I have no idea what they are about, but maybe they
might be of some use to you.
We’ll check those out, then.\! Thanks, Serana!
hat’s a bit of an awkward interaction...
No fair...\! When’re you gonna slap my ass with your fat cock?
There’s no hope for you is there?
Hmmm, a lot of these books seem to be gibberish or talk about nonsense.
Well, it seems that a lot of these books are just novels, not even lewd ones at that.
Are you and I even looking for the same things..?
OH! I found something! It seems like a small journal...
This is barely legible.\! Most of it is practically smudged.
Wait...\! This seems to have belonged to Hildr.\! Maybe we should take this back to her and
see if she can make something out of it.
